Uses of Package
edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer

  • Packages that use edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer 
    Package Description
    edu.cmu.sphinx.api  
    edu.cmu.sphinx.instrumentation
    Provides a set of classes that monitor and track operational aspects of the Sphinx system.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer
    Provides a set of high level classes and interfaces that are used to perform speech recognition with the Sphinx-4 speech recognition system.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.batch
    Provides an tool that performs batch-mode speech recognition.
    edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.live
    Provides an tool that performs pseudo-live-mode speech recognition.
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer used by edu.cmu.sphinx.api 
    Class and Description
    Recognizer
    The Sphinx-4 recognizer.
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer used by edu.cmu.sphinx.instrumentation 
    Class and Description
    Recognizer
    The Sphinx-4 recognizer.
    Recognizer.State
    Defines the possible states of the recognizer.
    StateListener
    The listener interface for receiving recognizer status events
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer used by edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer 
    Class and Description
    Recognizer.State
    Defines the possible states of the recognizer.
    StateListener
    The listener interface for receiving recognizer status events
  • Classes in edu.cmu.sphinx.recognizer used by edu.cmu.sphinx.tools.batch 
    Class and Description

    The Sphinx-4 recognizer.
